HTTP Routing Table

/api | /o
 
/api
GET /api/request/
GET /api/request/(int:id)/
GET /api/request_type/
GET /api/request_type/(int:id)/
POST /api/request/
PUT /api/request/(int:id)/
DELETE /api/request/(int:id)/
PATCH /api/request/(int:id)/
 
/o
POST /o/token/
